wikipedia_page.main:
Eddie Spearritt (born 31 January 1947) is an English retired footballer who played as a midfielder. He played for Ipswich Town, Brighton & Hove Albion, Carlisle United and Gillingham. He spent some seasons in the then-top level of the English football league system while with Ipswich and Carlisle. He won Brighton & Hove Albion player of the year.
He is the uncle of Hannah Spearritt, a member of S Club 7.

response: Spearritt is the niece of Eddie Spearritt, who played professional football in the then-top level of the English football league system.
